posts.post_title: Lot of (2) T206 with Cycle 350 back
posts.post_content:
SALE PENDING - Thank you!

Includes Charles and McElveen, both with mounting residue throughout the back. Fronts display at far greater level of condition however the Charles has a line impression/indentation that runs top to bottom on right edge. McElveen has a very faint impression along upper edge. Asking ---- for the pair (or make me an offer) via PP friends/family. Will be shipped priority.
